website_summaries.verdict: The quality of results makes the higher price worth it – produces darker skin with each use.
pros: Consistency makes it easy and smooth to apply
cons: Contains bronzer that may stain your hands orange if not washed promptly

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: This tan enhancing lotion helps deepen my tan, but the very best thing is that the odor is light and you will not leave the tanning bed smelling like burnt flesh. When a friend told me about this lotion I was skeptical but hopeful. I hate the after-tan smell. This lotion made a huge difference. I have only purchased one bottle so far, but I will be buying this again. I have never been a brand-specific snob about any lotion, tanning or otherwise. I am now! Fantastic product.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn Murdock

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Tanning Lotion
customer_reviews.text: I like my Bronzer tanning lotion to feel light, non greasy and not smell up the office like I was on the beach all day. SunGodz checks all of the boxes for me. An added bonus, I would say that the fragrance is faint and gender neutral. I've been asked by both men and women what I had on that smelled so good. It works great to! Even tanning and soft skin.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Baffy

customer_reviews.title: Smells good, does it's job
customer_reviews.text: I switched to this from 'Incredibly black' looking for a change, and hoping to see results a wee bit faster, however I think incredibly black works better with MY skin. This does smelly very pleasant and nothing like most tanning lotions, which is a great thing if you're looking for something with a softer smell. Personally, I don't mind, and even like the traditional tanning lotion smell. Also, I feel like the bottle was almost empty after two rounds, but that could have just been me piling it on the first couple times I went in, too. There's nothing wrong, but couldn't give it 5 stars because I'm just not in love with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan and Paige

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyed this product- I’m pale and my gym has a ...
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed this product- I’m pale and my gym has a crappy tanning bed, but after one week I’ve got a nice color happening. The smell is great, also. Unfortunately, it seems I’m allergic to something in the product and have to discontinue using it- it’s made me break out all over. Super bummed, because I thoroughly enjoyed it!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Love the texture
customer_reviews.text: This lotion smells so good! I just got back into tanning and I decided to try this product and I like the way that it feels more like a moisturizer than a lotion. It goes on very nice, and smells great. I only used this product once, and I already got a way darker tan than I usually do without it. Definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: william mclglaun

customer_reviews.title: I have recommended this already to others
customer_reviews.text: Have only used this 3 times and already have 1/2 the color that I usually get. I get very tan in the summer. I have recommended this already to others. Will purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Janice Payne

customer_reviews.title: Works well with a great scent and no streaks or staining.
customer_reviews.text: Love this tanning lotion! The scent is light and fresh and smells like berries. You'll notice color after the first or second use. It doesn't streak and doesn't stain hands or clothing. I've used many tanning products over the years and I think this is my favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Ginny Peluso

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Smells wonderful, absorbs fast, softens skin, and comes off of tanning bed easily.
customer_reviews.author: Robisiah

customer_reviews.title: I think they left out the tanning ingredient it does nothing for ur tan
customer_reviews.text: I was previously using the 100× solid black, So I thought this lotion would take my tan to the next level because it says 375× bronzer but when I started to use it I actually lost alot of my tan. I'm very faired skin so I need something that really darkens u and this product does not do it. I went back to solid black with way better results
customer_reviews.author: Peaches Tsocheff

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice and applies nice
customer_reviews.text: Smells nice - tropical scent - and it applies nicely - does not feel oily or too thick or sticky. It doesn't smell strong like some other brands, has a nice aroma to it. As for color, I'll have to go out in the sun a few more times to really know, but with the last two weeks of use, I'm quite happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Travel Bug

customer_reviews.title: I recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: Much love for this product! It doesn't leave the gross orange tint between your fingers, it applies very nice and it gave me an awesome color on the bed after just one use! I highly recommend this product for people who do not tan easy!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Great tanning lotion!
customer_reviews.text: Got my new lotion today and I must say Iove it!! After many years in the salon biz, I do know my lotions for sure. Smells great, not over powering like some others I've used, I'll leave those names out..... Feels great on the skin and seems to moisturize very well. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jene

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I will never buy another brand again! The scent of this is soft and in no way smells like other tanners. I have seen immediate results that last through shower after shower and I have noticed that I continue to develop throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Larson

customer_reviews.title: Brown Suga Tan
customer_reviews.text: Oh My! Not only does it work wonders to an amazingly even, tantalizing tan, it smells so YUM!!! My Forever Lotion!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ester Mills

customer_reviews.title: Super tan
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is soooo good.. nice rich darkness and no staining. My new go to!!!
customer_reviews.author: ann

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with the scent of this stuff. Like, I seriously wish I could wear it as lotion every day and not just for tanning.
customer_reviews.author: L. Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing and leaves my skin feeling soft
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing and leaves my skin feeling soft. As someone who tries to stay out of the sun for anti-aging purposes, this little bronzer is my new go-to product for getting that tan acceleration without actually having to spend too much time in the sun. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: lulubelle29

customer_reviews.title: Might work on different skin types
customer_reviews.text: I didn't help me tan at all. In the lotions defense, I'm fair skinned and hard to tan. Still looking for the right product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm very Northern Minnesota white and used this for a ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm very Northern Minnesota white and used this for a month while Mexico pre-tanning. I didn't notice much of a difference than when I don't use this kind of stuff, I guess that's why other reviewers called it a beginner's lotion. It claims to have tattoo guard which is something I was looking for, whether that stuff works is beyond me. I'll probably not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Danger

customer_reviews.title: Tanning bed lotion
customer_reviews.text: First time using. Nice thick lotion no odor didn't wash off you will notice a color or tanning on first use hoping it gives a dark tan as it stated. I've always used designer brand with good results but wanted a tanning lotion that bronzes and won't wash off after tanning like the other brands do
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Rutledge

customer_reviews.title: Clearly not what it says
customer_reviews.text: Not NEARLY as strong as others ive gotten with not as much bronzer in them..(supposedly). ..the color is just a light tan. I couldn't tell anything from it and I buy these every year. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: BusyBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Do you want to be a sunkissed goddess? Because this is how you do it
customer_reviews.text: This turned me into a beautiful sunkissed goddess. Really though, this stuff was great. I used Australian gold for my tanning lotion and decided to try something new. It has a pleasant smell. It rubbed it in well before tanning, it didn't leave streaks and the tan was very nice and solid. 5/5 would buy again
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: I hate the smell
customer_reviews.text: I hate the smell.... smells like chewed strawberry bubblegum. Besides that the lotion makes my skin feel super hydrated and soft. Gives a good color and not orange or streaky. Besides the fact I feel like I smell like a 13 year old girl I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Find Effective
customer_reviews.text: I did not get the expected results using this tanner. I have experienced much better and quicker results with other brands.
customer_reviews.author: kc

customer_reviews.title: WTH!!!
customer_reviews.text: Good product but the Price jump is Ridiculous!! Keep it..there's others out there just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Product has no seal and leaked during transit all over the bag
customer_reviews.text: When received the lotion had leaked out all over the bag it was shipped in. There was no seal. The product Itself was average.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Brown

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I really like the tanning lotion. I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Dean L.

customer_reviews.title: It is also very creamy so it's easy to apply onto your body
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend has pale skin so he has difficulty getting a tan. After using SunGodz hes been twice as tanned. It is also very creamy so it's easy to apply onto your body.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip C.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this I have been tanning for years and this tanning lotion mad my skin have white spots onmr for life.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Bronzer not the best
customer_reviews.text: Bronzer was not as good as some others but was ok
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Jones

customer_reviews.title: Smells Heavenly
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great, I didn’t turn orange from the bronzers. It also has a smell that I can’t describe, but it’s wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Chrimson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: This SunGodZ is awesome. The fragrance is faint, feel light, no greasy, and the lotion works great! I am happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: AMZ Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy swedish beauty or jwow but this is my new favorite bronzer. Doesn't have that sticky feeling, and it smells like bubblegum.
customer_reviews.author: kayla holland

customer_reviews.title: Bronzer doesn't work as expected.
customer_reviews.text: I like the smell and it conditions well, but the bronzer isn't very effective. It doesn't give me much coloring even after tanning. After 3 weeks, I have a slight tint, but mostly a reddish color. It's not the results I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Pam S.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work. Possibly not the real product it claims to be.
customer_reviews.text: This product was a waste of my money. It does not work. I'm not happy with it at all. I don't recommend buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Good product a little pricey
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for 5 12 minutes session and I can clearly see a difference. My wife said even my but looks dark. I have light skin that burns easy and hardly e ver tan but that has changed.
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic. Since I started using it I have been ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. Since I started using it I have been getting compliments about how healthy I look. and most of all love how it has no discernable clinging smell! So important. My go-to now.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great tan item
customer_reviews.text: Smooth and silky when applied. Doesn't take much either. Great tan item.
customer_reviews.author: Farm Girl 1963

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It was leaking when I received it. But overall the tan was great! I’m really white, so I have to tan a lot! Anyways I can definitely tell a difference in just one tan with the color!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Ensey

customer_reviews.title: Bummer...
customer_reviews.text: Was so optimistic about this product based on the reviews but ended up disappointed. Product wasn't sealed and feels a bit watery. Did not produce the brozing I was hoping for. Used it about 5 times during outdoor tanning sessions. May have worked well for others, did not work well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kaydi Forgia

customer_reviews.title: It works 😃
customer_reviews.text: Love this tanning lotion. Definitely gives me the results I’m looking for. Also has a great scent which is definitely a plus.
customer_reviews.author: C castle

customer_reviews.title: Smells decent and feels good on your skin but doesn't have much bronzer in ...
customer_reviews.text: Smells decent and feels good on your skin but doesn't have much bronzer in it. It claims to be 375x bronzer but I barely got any color after tanning with it. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: This is the nest lotion I have ever used smells good and feels great
customer_reviews.text: I wish I can order more. This is the nest lotion I have ever used smells good and feels great. and works amazingly well
customer_reviews.author: Tim Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Don't notice much of a notice when using product vs not using one
customer_reviews.author: Corrinnia L.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this lotion it's made my skin feel amazing and I'm getting super tan using it.
customer_reviews.author: Abern002

customer_reviews.title: Great lotion
customer_reviews.text: Loved this tanning lotion. Gave me a nice color and made my skin so soft after using it. Definitely recommend it and will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Pitner

customer_reviews.title: Bronzer
customer_reviews.text: Great product and smells better than any tanning lotion I have used. Only wish it had a bit more bronzer.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Maurer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome lotion! Definitely shows deep color within just three uses. No lingering aroma. It’s not oily or sticky. Great product. I will buy it again. Quick and efficient shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Sun lotion
customer_reviews.text: Ok, not the best. Don't think I would buy again. Smells nice
customer_reviews.author: Grace Anne Dallin-Cauchi

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its not bad for the price. No tingle @all. Got a lil color from it .
customer_reviews.author: miami

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice, no sticky residue
customer_reviews.text: Smells nice, no sticky residue, spreads over body great, so you don’t have to use a lot of it, last a long time! My tan is amazing! Will order more
customer_reviews.author: Gina wallace

customer_reviews.title: Smells really good, not like normal tanning lotion
customer_reviews.text: Smells really good, not like normal tanning lotion. Kind of watery though and I don't feel like it bronzed my skin as well as I expected.

customer_reviews.title: Great for sun sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for sun tanning in salon. Prevents burning and has even tan.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Buy over and over again!
customer_reviews.text: Have bought this lotion repeatedly. As a guy I like the fact that it doesn’t have much of a perfume scent.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Lyle

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product will stain hands if you do not wipe off immediately
customer_reviews.author: Boy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great lotion!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bronzer! Quick results and less time spent in the tanning bed! Smells good!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Not orangy
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Smell is nice! Doesn’t turn you orange! I’ve had so many complements on my tan!
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Within two days of use I developed a superior golden deep tan. So many people asked me how I got so tan so quick. The smell after tanning was not the age old tanning smell-it was fresh and light. It also keeps me moisturized. A+ product. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: good fruity smell
customer_reviews.text: Saw results after 1st use, and even more after that, good fruity smell, love this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but not much better results than using
customer_reviews.text: it seems to be working, but not much better results than using nothing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ready for the beach
customer_reviews.text: This product works as advertised. My skin is very pale and I always feel uncomfortable on the beach, also I cannot stand the sun too much either. This is giving me a darker shade, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Earthwell

customer_reviews.title: Very good lotion
customer_reviews.text: Got this tanning lotion and have used it several times I love it. I will buy more of it.
customer_reviews.author: stacie blue

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: This item came damaged. Lid was off and produced leaked out. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Horton

customer_reviews.title: Not sure on this product
customer_reviews.text: It seems watery and not getting results as I expected
customer_reviews.author: Jacinda Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Feels good
customer_reviews.text: Good smell,works great gave me the deep rich tan i was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: george moreno

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Used for a week and no difference at all. By the description and reviews, I expected a lot more from this Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells like sugary candy.. wish the scent wasn't so strong
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Lewis

customer_reviews.title: love the smell of this product
customer_reviews.text: love the smell of this product!! I havent used it in the tanning bed yet but I used it while at the beach and had a beautiful bronze glow the next day! Highly recommend trying it!
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: didnt get good color.. was disappointed with purchase after using, since it had such good reviews
customer_reviews.author: Lorrie

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and works terrific!
customer_reviews.text: This tanning lotion is good stuff. The most important part to me is that it smells terrific! Most tanning lotions smell funky but this one smells good and gets the job done! After only using it for about 5 days I would say I am at least a few shades darker and its looks really good. I would recommend this lotion to anyone that has trouble getting a natural sun tan or simply wants to get tan quickly without exposing their skin to the sun and risk a sunburn. Overall great product and I will probably be ordering a few more bottles for my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Weston

customer_reviews.title: Would not purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Was not happy at all with results from this lotion. What little color that developed after 7 straight days of tanning faded after 2
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but it smells good, feels good on my skin
customer_reviews.text: I don't necessarily know if the tanning lotion is getting me darker, but it smells good, feels good on my skin, and I'm getting a really nice, even, dark tan. It doesn't leave my skin orange. It doesn't stick between my fingers and make them look dirty (like some other lotions with bronzer have a tendency to do). So I would definitely recommend and would likely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: LM34

customer_reviews.title: This stuff smells amazing. I love how it does not smell like ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells amazing. I love how it does not smell like other tanning lotions when they are on. There is always a weird smell once put on your skin when using tanning lotions. This smells wonderful. A little bit goes along way. I was putting alot on my hands like I usually do when I use lotions and found that it spreads easily and covered more of my body. I have gotten a few compliments from people already asking if I have been in the sun and I have a nice tan glow. I have used it twice so far and will continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Fabbizzy

customer_reviews.title: I was jealous of my friend
customer_reviews.text: I was jealous of my friend, when she bought a Bronzer Tanning lotion, so I had to get one asap. This is the first tanning lotion that I have used and I love it!! My skin is smoother and darker and on top of that the lotion smells great. It's been my first couple of times tanning and this is the first tanning lotion that I have used and I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: SweetAnnie

customer_reviews.title: Really good for quick results.
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful for taking quickly. The beginners show results after one use while helping you get a long lasting tan. Have been using for a week and am already getting lots of comments on how tan i look all of a sudden.
customer_reviews.author: LindsvanleerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: ... back to the dark chocolate lotion 200x this worked great for me and you can see the bronzer in ...
customer_reviews.text: lost my tan using this product with a 375x bronzer you would think I would be dark but now I have to start over and go back to the dark chocolate lotion 200x this worked great for me and you can see the bronzer in it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The smell was pleasant so that’s the only thing that was good about it
customer_reviews.text: I used this for about a week and got nothing from it. The smell was pleasant so that’s the only thing that was good about it.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Did not like the product at all
customer_reviews.text: Did not like the product at all. Does not stand up to product information. Did not have any tan difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This lotion is amazing. It makes my skin feel good and it ...
customer_reviews.text: This lotion is amazing. It makes my skin feel good and it works great too. It also smells wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I don't like this at all. After spending 2 months in FL I wanted to maintain my tan, so I got this. I like the smell and it washes of my hands nicely. But it takes me twice as much shower soap to get it off my skin and I am losing my tan instead of keeping it, after using the entire bottle. I will not get this again.
customer_reviews.author: Madea

customer_reviews.title: the first couple of times using this i felt a ...
customer_reviews.text: the first couple of times using this i felt a tad on the orange side I alternated with the Brown Sugar Black Chocolate and that seemed to even out the orange tone. i have a rich tan and get lots of compliments on my color. my skin also feels very soft afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just "ok"- won't purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this tanning lotion based on reviews, but I don't see results that justify the price. The lotion smells pleasant and goes on nicely, however it didn't help me tan any faster than other lesser priced lotions. I also have a friend using it to see if it was just me and the same results were achieved. Please not, I normally tan easily so that's not the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Only thing good about it
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for weeks. Does not tan ! I follow directions exactly. Only thing good about it, it smells good... Definitely not worth the 40.00 plus I paid for it.. I have been using it with a tanning lamp. I am willing to try it when I can sit out in the sun. Will need several weeks til it gets warm enough. I live in Phoenix, >Arizona. In about three weeks it should be warm enough to give it an honest try...
customer_reviews.author: Lon

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE this
customer_reviews.text: After one use i became a few shades darker! LOVE LOVE LOVE this!!! Smell is amazing too and arrived right as scheduled! Will DEF order again!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect scent, feel and moisture
customer_reviews.text: Light airy scent, still makes u think of beach without being overpowering. Glides on, works well, slight tingle on face. I'm allergic to everything under the sun so I was nervous; slept w on bottom of my arm one night and no issues, tried in tanning bed next day, gr8! Slight color on clothes if still wet, once soaks in I haven't noticed anything bleeding off. Skin feels silky. I added a 10spf moisturizing sunscreen before putting this on , no reaction, perfect tan, even for faired skinned me!!!
customer_reviews.author: L. Greer

customer_reviews.title: Sold i love it
customer_reviews.text: I've never used anything so quick before! After ONE TAN I saw a difference. I never write reviews for anything but this I had to. This is a must buy if you're looking for a nice, even, tan. Watch out for those streaky fingers though! Use a towel after applying to get it off of the finger cracks, it works. I'll be buying this forever! GET IT. GET IT NOW. DO IT. YOU KNOW YOU WANT TO.Will definitely only us this from now on
customer_reviews.author: Chad W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Tanning Product
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time that I have ordered this product. Love it! Smells good and does not leave that 'after tanning odor'. There is no streaking and it doesn't stain my hands. After a good base tan, I have even used this product at the beach. I am a 70 year old quintessential tanner. Peace...
customer_reviews.author: Taigyn's Mammie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this lotion!!! It has a great scent and doesn't leave you with that "after tanning" smell!! I noticed results after just two sessions!! I'm hooked for sure and will recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: dumplingqueen

customer_reviews.title: Sucks
customer_reviews.text: The reviews were great. I guess just flat out lies. The palm of my hands are orange. I guess if you like liquid color. I don't.
customer_reviews.author: Anna J.

customer_reviews.title: Instantly works
customer_reviews.text: Smells great! Your skin is left darker even after the first use. I had a compliment on my skin tone the next day by a stranger and I only went tanning one day! Amazing stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Stewart

customer_reviews.title: This usually happens in problem spots but overall doesn't leave an orange tint to skin unless you're super pale. Wouldn't recommend for fair skinned beginners due ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well, though I don't believe it's an accelerator. Also leaves orange streaks if you don't exfoliate, moisturize and be sure to apply liberally. This usually happens in problem spots but overall doesn't leave an orange tint to skin unless you're super pale. Wouldn't recommend for fair skinned beginners due to this.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Sato

customer_reviews.title: works well and smells even better
customer_reviews.text: This lotion works really well but even smells better. I really think this increases your tan and you don't smell like normal tan lotion. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Ames Ennis RAT

customer_reviews.title: No complaints. Got a nice tan
customer_reviews.text: The smell isn't bad. In past experiences bronzers can tend to smell pretty bad once applied. Didn't notice a huge difference after first use, but I didn't turn out orange. I did tan very nicely out in the sun for an hour or so. No streaks, even after showering.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn J.

customer_reviews.title: Natural coloring!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this on my legs just while outside playing with my kids and I've seen a noticable change in color. It is a natural tan instead of an orange color from other products!
customer_reviews.author: Moose

customer_reviews.title: Works with a warming!
customer_reviews.text: This works. But if you have any age spots, don't use it. It will darken them making them very prominent.
customer_reviews.author: James the Elder

customer_reviews.title: If you want an excellent sun tanning lotion this is the one
customer_reviews.text: If you want an excellent sun tanning lotion this is the one. No nasty orange glow. As close as you can probably get to the sun with this, and when you combine it with sunbathing absolutely glowing effects.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great value and product
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful scent, nice dark tan. No marks on hands. Will buy again. Keeps you moisturized and glowing
customer_reviews.author: F. C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with this lotion for the price I paid. It smells great too.
customer_reviews.author: M Davis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome smell and quick results
customer_reviews.text: If you want to get dark quick, buy this. Awesome smell and quick results!
customer_reviews.author: RUTH

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell of this lotion
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell of this lotion. I have only used it once, so can't say how the tan will progress. I'm sure it will be awesome.
customer_reviews.author: mimicici

product_meta.title: Indoor Tanning Lotion with Bronzer for Indoor Tanning Beds - Dark Tan Accelerator and Pro Tan Lotion Uses the Best Bronzer & is the Luxury Sunless Tanning Lotion for Skin Tanning - Highest Quality

We did the research so you don’t have to. You Deserve Luxury & it’s time to treat yourself to it.

This indoor tanning lotion with bronzer is Shower Proof too!
We know how frustrating it can be to have lotions for tanning wash off… but not anymore! This silicone lotion contains premium Anti-Run Off ingredients.
Take long showers knowing your Sexy Dark Tan will stay!

What Makes Our Tanning Lotion the BEST?! *  Shower Proof

Money Back Guarantee!

If You’re Ready to Get Dark, Turn Heads & Have Fun in the Sun with the best Premium Tanning Lotion …Click Add to Cart Now! *

VERSITYLE & MULTI PURPOSE – Whether you’re going out for a Relaxing day at the salon or Lazy day at the beach… You’ve found the Right Choice! You can travel with peace of mind knowing you will be able to tan indoors or outdoors…PLUS you’ll Smell Fresh! You know the Right Choice… (it’s time to treat yourself to a Quality Experience).

BEST VALUE GUARANTEED - We want you to lavish your time in the sun and feel COMFORTABLE doing it!
